availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Alonzo D. Clark (Hart County, Kentucky, constable)

body.p: Hart County, Kentucky, constable. Kentucky native. Resident of Hart County in 1850 and 1860. Constable of Hart County in 1864.

bibl.p: Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Hart County, KY, February 1864, p. 68, (Accessed via ancestry.com). Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hart County, p. 173. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hart County, Munfordville, District 2, p. 132. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hart County, District 6, p. 5. Find A Grave, "Alonzo D. Clark (1833-1917)," Memorial #113887642, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/113887642/alonzo-d.-clark (accessed June 5, 2017).
